text: The 2011–12 FC Karpaty Lviv season was the 49th season in club history. ==Review and events== On 8 June 2011 FC Karpaty gathered at club's base for medical inspection after vacations. The club went to two-week training camp in Austrian Alps on 19 June 2011 ===Friendly matches=== ====Pre-season==== ====Mid-season==== ====Winter break==== ===Premier League=== ====League table====
